Antiqua - Chapel.description: Light streaks through the stained glass windows and scatters itself across the pews and altar that lies at the front of the chapel. A priest is standing by the altar cleaning up after a recent ceremony.

altar.description: A pristine marble alter, lined with gold trim. Religious trinkets lie on top, ready for use in various ceremonies. The priest sees you examing the altar and makes a motion, encouraging you to pray.
